thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 48 of 552
thread.title: Kristin

author: Kristin
title: Kristin
text: Great customer service when I have had problems, which is rare. I have ordered from this company about a dozen times. Great quality products for a reasonable price and it's great because I know what sizes work for me now that I am a regular customer, not to mention when they have new products they have a great review system so you can tell if it runs true to size, small, or larger than normal. All of the products arrive in a timely fashion and returns are easy! Yup, I pretty much love this company inside and out.
